text: Joseph Mukasa Zuza (2 October 1945 - 15 January 2015) was a Malawian Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest on 2 July 1986. He was appointed the bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Mzuzu on 3 March 1995. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Malawian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Joseph Mukasa Zuza
